sentences.pinyin: Wǒ mǎi le yī shuāng xīn de pí xié.
sentences.translation: I bought a pair of new leather shoes.

sentences.simplifiedText: 为了参加婚礼，他特意选了一双质量上乘的皮鞋。
sentences.traditionalText: 為了參加婚禮，他特意選了一雙質量上乘的皮鞋。
sentences.pinyin: Wèi le cānjiā hūnlǐ, tā tèyì xuǎn le yī shuāng zhìliàng shàngchéng de pí xié.
sentences.translation: For the wedding, he specifically chose a pair of high-quality leather shoes.
